thread.title: We Are Not Trump Volume Two | We Are Not Trump
thread.title_full: We Are Not Trump Volume Two | We Are Not Trump

title: We Are Not Trump Volume Two | We Are Not Trump
text: Track Name: Arms and Ears - Soon Soon we'll come for you we'll come for you for all the lies you tried to hide did you think that we never knew? all the kids are blocking the roads there's no one left to control so run and hide don't you know I never lie you, so cold and cruel you sold the school to help you pay for all your ties did you think that we never? all the kids are going to make sure that your caskets closed don't you know I never lie I never lie glowing eyes are on the side of the road and theres nothing we can do they climb from the road to your lap and what they take from you, you won't get back glowing eyes are on the side of the road and you've never felt so used their claws down the length of your back with their clothes in rags but their souls intact glowing eyes are on the side of the road these glowing eyes are yours to be whole Track Name: Aloud - Backs To The Wall (WANT Version) So many of us underground You could swim, though you’d probably drown But your mind is already made up And you do things to hate to protect all the people you love I know we can make it fall If enough have our backs to the wall Yeah, I know it won’t change a damn thing Politicians will steal all our youth As they squander our dreams My heart, it beats so slow Yeah, when I realize that I may be wrong But regardless, rebellion’s my answer when they offer none You and I sing an urban hymn The richest of men can’t deny That a song lifts hope to a thousand feet Our last defense in life I know we can make it fall If enough have our backs to the wall Yeah I know we can make it fall Track Name: Snowhaus - Ice Fields All along the way there I was thinking I was wasted all the time I couldnt make it to my car and I think I know the way all the things I had to say lost under the ice over the lake and you tell me that your waiting waiting for me i'll bring the super solid ice fields ice to bring the freeze and i can see that you're crazy about me well i can feel my tires slipping focus shifting back and forth something like this shouldnt be ignored and i think I know the way all the things I had to say lost under the ice over the lake Track Name: The Big Lonesome - Everytown USA Cool cats, flashing back, dressed in black, and tight pair of jeans Wait in line with the ghosts, smoking cloves, like they’re still fifteen I overheard one of them say The signs coming down Monday There’s no places for the bands to play Come on down, welcome ‘round to Everytown USA He puts his records like a shepherd in the back seat of his car He puts his stash and some cash in an envelope inside his guitar While the radio cuts in and out He’s thinking what itll be like down south See what everyone’s been talkin’ about Come on down, welcome ‘round to Everytown USA He gets a job in the fall tending bar in the hip part of town Two man band, from Savannah’s strumming a bit too loud The American girls just stare Appearing not to care And all the guys have the same goddamned hair Come on down, welcome ‘round to Everytown USA Track Name: Ochmoneks - Esperanto Song don't be afraid my precious one you're just confused by these independent thoughts. so stay quiet and lie still, and i'll make sure this all goes away. don't think negatively or worry, you'll be safe as long as i'm in complete control. so stay quiet and lie still, and i'll make sure this all goes away. Track Name: Princess Problems - Godspeed (featuring Kasson) It’ll go, it’ll go, it’ll go away all on it’s own How could it, how could it have grown, how could it have grown Maybe if, maybe if we’d known, maybe if we’d known But we did, but we did and we didn’t watch the throne Gather your belongings ‘cause he’s coming Gather all your loved ones ‘cause he’s hunting Gather all your strength the lengths he’s going Gather all your courage, hurry, oh he’s right behind us Godspeed
